channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 10:33 Air alert in Chernivtsi region. Follow for further updates.
item.description: 🔴 10:33 Air alert in Chernivtsi region. Follow for further updates. #Chernivtsi_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 10:33 Threat of artillery shelling! Now there is artillery shelling in the Pokrovska territorial community. Go to shelter!
item.description: 🔴 10:33 Threat of artillery shelling! Now there is artillery shelling in the Pokrovska territorial community. Go to shelter! #Pokrovska_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
